title: What did Russia trade on the Silk Road? - Quora

response.answer_text: Pre-Mongolian Rus was selling slaves, furs, beeswax and honey, linen fabrics, some types of jewelry. It was buying silk and cloth, swords, non-ferrous metals (silver, copper, tin, lead), spices. Of course, those were just the most popular goods. All sorts of stuff were bought and sold by Rus merchants.
